title: Villages of the lake district
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Village communities - Great Britain
Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Great Britain - Description and travel
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Village communities - Great Britain
Economics, Philosophy, Politics, Religion & Sociology/Village communities
description: This documentary style production seeks out the fascinating history lying in the many villages tucked away within the district. Join W. R. Mitchell M.B.E. as he visits lakes around the villages of Rydal, Grasmere, Wasdale, Grange in Borrowdale, Troutbeck, Hartsop, Askham, Dacre, Hawkshead, Sawrey and many others. Take in the splendour of village life and the breathtaking scenery.
